,CONCAT_WS(', ', p_option->>'$[0].title',p_option->>'$[1].title',p_option->>'$[2].title') P_OPTION_DT FROM product LEFT JOIN ( SELECT category1.CATE_NAME AS CATE_NAME1, category1.CATE_IDX AS CATE_IDX1, category1.CATE_DEPTH, category2.CATE_NAME AS CATE_NAME2, category2.CATE_IDX AS CATE_IDX2, IF(category2.CATE_SPEC ='Y', JSON_ARR_TO_STR(category2.CATE_SPEC_LIST), '') AS CATE_SPEC_LIST_DT, IF(category2.CATE_SPEC ='Y', category2.CATE_SPEC_LIST, '') AS CATE_SPEC_LIST, category3.CATE_NAME AS CATE_NAME3, category3.CATE_IDX AS CATE_IDX3

LEFT JOIN category AS brand ON P_CATE_IDX2 = brand.CATE_IDX LEFT JOIN company AS store ON P_COM_IDX = store.COM_IDX /* LEFT JOIN company AS manufacture ON P_COM_IDX2 = manufacture.COM_IDX*/ LEFT JOIN company AS afterservice ON P_COM_IDX2 = afterservice.COM_IDX WHERE P_IDX is not null

LEFT JOIN category AS brand ON P_CATE_IDX2 = brand.CATE_IDX LEFT JOIN company AS store ON P_COM_IDX = store.COM_IDX /* LEFT JOIN company AS manufacture ON P_COM_IDX2 = manufacture.COM_IDX*/ LEFT JOIN company AS afterservice ON P_COM_IDX2 = afterservice.COM_IDX
WHERE P_IDX is not null
